SEARCH
Package co.edu.escuelaing.application

Class HelloService

java.lang.Object
co.edu.escuelaing.application.HelloService
public class HelloService extends Object
The HelloService class provides RESTful endpoints for various utilities. This class contains methods annotated with @GetMapping that handle HTTP GET requests. It demonstrates how to use @RequestParam to handle request parameters with default values and conversions.

Each method in this class corresponds to a specific URL endpoint and returns a result based on the request parameters or performs a simple computation.

  • Constructor Details

      public HelloService()

  • Method Details

    • hello

      public static String hello(String name)
      Returns a greeting message.

      This endpoint responds to GET requests at /hello. It takes an optional name parameter from the request, with a default value of "World" if not provided, and returns a greeting message.

      Parameters:
      name - the name to greet. Defaults to "World" if not provided in the request.
      Returns:
      a greeting message including the provided name.

    • pi

      public static String pi()
      Returns the value of PI.

      This endpoint responds to GET requests at /pi and returns the value of PI.

      Returns:
      a string representation of the value of PI.

    • uuid

      public static String uuid()
      Returns a UUID.

      This endpoint responds to GET requests at /uuid and returns a randomly generated UUID.

      Returns:
      a string representation of a randomly generated UUID.

    • bye

      public static String bye()
      Returns a goodbye message.

      This endpoint responds to GET requests at /bye and returns a simple goodbye message.

      Returns:
      a goodbye message.

    • random

      public static String random(double min, double max)
      Returns a random number within the specified range.

      This endpoint responds to GET requests at /random. It takes min and max parameters from the request to generate and return a random number within the specified range.

      Parameters:
      min - the minimum value for the random number.
      max - the maximum value for the random number.
      Returns:
      a string representation of a random number within the specified range.

    • pow

      public static String pow(double base, double exponent)
      Returns the power of a base raised to an exponent.

      This endpoint responds to GET requests at /pow. It takes base and exponent parameters from the request and returns the result of raising the base to the power of the exponent.

      Parameters:
      base - the base value.
      exponent - the exponent value.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the result of base raised to exponent.
